TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PictureBox extends System.Windows.Forms.Control implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class PictureBox Inherits Control Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示用于显示图像的 Windows 图片框控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows picture box control for displaying an image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常用于显示图形从位图、 图元文件、 图标、 JPEG、 GIF 或 PNG 文件。Typically the is used to display graphics from a bitmap, metafile, icon, JPEG, GIF, or PNG file. 设置属性你想要显示，请在设计时或在运行时。Set the property to the you want to display, either at design time or at run time. 你可以通过设置或者指定的映像属性并加载使用以同步方式图像方法或使用以异步方式方法。You can alternatively specify the image by setting the property and load the image synchronously using the method or asynchronously using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果你想要使用的相同映像中存在多个控件，每个创建的映像克隆。If you want to use the same image in multiple controls, create a clone of the image for each . 从多个控件访问同一个映像都会导致发生异常。Accessing the same image from multiple controls causes an exception to occur. 属性，用于设置中的值为枚举，控制剪辑和定位中的显示区域的图像。The property, which is set to values in the enumeration, controls the clipping and positioning of the image in the display area. 你可以在运行时更改的显示区域的大小属性。You can change the size of the display area at run time with the property. 默认情况下，控件在显示时没有任何边框。By default, the control is displayed by without any borders. 你可以提供标准或三维边框使用属性来分辨出图片框中的窗体中，其余部分，即使它不包含任何图像。You can provide a standard or three-dimensional border using the property to distinguish the picture box from the rest of the form, even if it contains no image. 不是一个可选择的控件，这意味着它不能接收输入的焦点。The is not a selectable control, which means that it cannot receive input focus. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置图像和调整大小图片框的显示区域。The following code example illustrates how you can set an image and resize the display area of the picture box. 此示例需要`ShowMyImage`在现有的表单，并调用命名空间已添加到你的窗体的源代码。This example requires that `ShowMyImage` is called in an existing form, and that the namespace has been added to the source code for your form. [!code-cpp[Classic PictureBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PictureBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PictureBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PictureBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PictureBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PictureBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |项Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||`null`| ||| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将和控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and controls. 通过设置初始化和属性使用和枚举，分别。The is initialized by setting the and properties using the and enumerations, respectively. 填入的示例图片目录中的图片。The is populated with pictures from the Sample Pictures directory. 时处理，方法使用事件以确定是否选择了某个项的控件。The method is used when handling the event of the control to determine whether an item is selected. 如果选择了某个项，事件处理程序将显示所选的文件通过设置属性。If an item is selected, the event handler displays the selected file by setting the property. 该示例需要具有位于 C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My 收藏 \ 示例图片目录中的 JPG 文件。The example requires that you have JPG files located in the C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My Pictures\Sample Pictures directory. 若要运行该示例，请将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`InitializePictureBox`和`PopulateListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。To run the example, paste the code into a form and call the `InitializePictureBox` and `PopulateListView` methods in the form's constructor or event-handling method. 确保所有事件都都使用其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以在设计时指定此属性，或运行时间。You can specify this property at design time or run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将和控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and controls. 通过设置初始化和属性使用和枚举，分别。The is initialized by setting the and properties using the and enumerations, respectively. 填入的示例图片目录中的图片。The is populated with pictures from the Sample Pictures directory. 时处理，方法在中使用事件以确定是否选择了某个项的控件。The method is used in when handling the event of the control to determine whether an item is selected. 如果选择了某个项，事件处理程序将显示所选的文件通过设置属性。If an item is selected, the event handler displays the selected file by setting the property. 该示例需要具有位于 C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My 收藏 \ 示例图片目录中的 JPG 文件。The example requires that you have JPG files located in the C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My Pictures\Sample Pictures directory. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`InitializePictureBox`和`PopulateListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a form and call the `InitializePictureBox` and `PopulateListView` methods in the form's constructor or event-handling method. 确保所有事件都都使用其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 取消异步图像加载。

span.span: Cancels an asynchronous image load.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A时在异步加载图像属性是`false`和方法用于加载图像。A image is loaded asynchronously when the property is `false` and the method is used to load the image. 如果负载已取消，引发报告方法取消事件和属性设置为`true`。If a load is canceled with the method cancellation is reported by raising the event with the property of the set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含名为`pictureBox1`和两个控件名为`startLoadButton`和`cancelLoadButton`。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1` and two controls named `startLoadButton` and `cancelLoadButton`. 请确保的按钮的事件是在此示例中其事件处理方法关联。Make sure that the event for the buttons is associated with their event-handling method in this example. 必须将图像文件路径更改为你系统上有效的路径。You must change the image file path to a path that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 为 则释放托管资源和非托管资源；为 则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release managed and unmanaged resources; to release unmanaged resources only.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 获取或设置由 显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed by .
The to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为要显示的 。The property is set to the to display. 在设计时或在运行时，你可以执行此操作。You can do this either at design time or at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如果你想要使用的相同映像中存在多个控件，每个创建的映像克隆。If you want to use the same image in multiple controls, create a clone of the image for each . 从多个控件访问同一个映像都会导致发生异常。Accessing the same image from multiple controls causes an exception to occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在运行时创建位图，并将其显示在通过设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a bitmap at runtime and display it in a by setting the property. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`CreateBitmapAtRuntime`从窗体的构造函数。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form and call `CreateBitmapAtRuntime` from the form's constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.CreateBitmapAtRuntime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CreateBitmapAtRuntime/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.CreateBitmapAtRuntime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CreateBitmapAtRuntime/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImageLocation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 中显示的图像的路径或 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the path or URL for the image to display in the .

value.span: 要在 中显示的图像的路径或 URL。

span.span: The path or URL for the image to display in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值可以是实际的路径 (例如，"C:\SomeFolder\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg")、 相对路径 ("\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg") 或 URL (http://contoso.com/images/Picture.jpg)。The property value can be an actual path (for example, "C:\SomeFolder\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg"), a relative path ("\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg"), or a URL (http://contoso.com/images/Picture.jpg). 如果使用相对路径，则将被视为相对于工作目录。If a relative path is used, it will be considered relative to the working directory. 调用方法将覆盖属性，设置方法调用中指定的 URL 值。A call to the method will overwrite the property, setting to the URL value specified in the method call.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load(string url) cil managed

param.name: url
param.span: 要在 中显示的图像的路径。

span.span: The path for the image to display in the .

summary.span: 将 设置为指定的 URL，并显示指示的图像。

span.span: Sets the to the specified URL and displays the image indicated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`url`参数指示本地文件，建议的格式是本地文件路径。If the `url` parameter indicates a local file, the recommended format is a local file path. 例如，图像文件命名为 myPicture.jpglocated atc: \ 将通过传递访问**c:\myPicture.jpg**为`url`参数。For example, an image file named myPicture.jpglocated atc:\ would be accessed by passing **c:\myPicture.jpg** for the `url` parameter. 完整路径，如** http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg **，或相对路径，如 **./images/image.jpg**，可以使用。A full path, such as **http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg**, or a relative path, such as **./images/image.jpg**, can be used. 如果使用相对路径，则将被视为相对于工作目录。If a relative path is used, it will be considered relative to the working directory. 调用方法设置属性的值`url`。A call to the method sets the property to the value of `url`.

span.span: is or an empty string.

exception.span: 引用无法访问的 Web 上的图像。

span.span: refers to an image on the Web that cannot be accessed.
refers to a file that is not an image.
refers to a file that does not exist.

summary.span: 异步加载图像。

span.span: Loads the image asynchronously.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 异步加载图像。

span.span: Loads the image asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了调用方法，属性必须设置为`false`以异步加载图像。Besides calling the method, the property must be set to `false` to load an image asynchronously. 当异步加载图像时，你可以处理事件以确定图像加载的进度或事件，以确定当图像加载已完成。When you load an image asynchronously, you can handle the event to determine the progress of an image load or the event to determine when an image load has completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadAsync(string url) cil managed

param.name: url
param.span: 要在 中显示的图像的路径。

span.span: The path for the image to display in the .

summary.span: 异步加载位于指定位置的图像。

span.span: Loads the image at the specified location, asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`url`参数指示本地文件，建议的格式是本地文件路径。If the `url` parameter indicates a local file, the recommended format is a local file path. 例如，图像文件命名为 myPicture.jpglocated atc: \ 将通过传递访问**c:\myPicture.jpg**为`url`参数。For example, an image file named myPicture.jpglocated atc:\ would be accessed by passing **c:\myPicture.jpg** for the `url` parameter. 完整路径，如** http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg **，或相对路径，如 **./images/image.jpg**，可以使用。A full path, such as **http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg**, or a relative path, such as **./images/image.jpg**, can be used. 如果使用相对路径，则将被视为相对于工作目录。If a relative path is used, it will be considered relative to the working directory. 调用方法设置属性的值`url`。A call to the method sets the property to the value of `url`. 调用方法设置属性的值`url`。A call to the method sets the property to the value of `url`. 除了调用方法，你必须设置属性`false`以异步加载图像。Besides calling the method, you must set the property to `false` to load an image asynchronously. 当异步加载图像时，你可以处理事件以确定图像加载的进度或事件，以确定当图像加载已完成。When you load an image asynchronously, you can handle the event to determine the progress of an image load or the event to determine when an image load has completed. 如果在异步图像加载操作期间发生错误，它将捕捉和报告的属性。If an error occurs during an asynchronous image-loading operation, it will be caught and reported by the property of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含名为`pictureBox1`和名为`startLoadButton`。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1` and a named `startLoadButton`. 请确保与关联的按钮的事件`startLoadButton_Click`在此示例中的方法。Make sure that the event for the button is associated with the `startLoadButton_Click` method in this example. 必须将图像文件路径更改为你系统上有效的路径。You must change the image file path to a path that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadCompleted As AsyncCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 在异步图像加载操作完成、取消或引发异常时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the asynchronous image-load operation is completed, been canceled, or raised an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发生仅映像异步加载时通过使用之一方法，和是`false`。The occurs only when the image is loaded asynchronously by using one of the methods, and is `false`. 如果图像加载取消通过调用方法属性将设置为`true`。If the image-load is canceled by calling the method the property of the will be set to `true`. 如果在加载过程中发生异常或错误，将捕获和属性将包含异常信息。If an exception or error occurs during the load process, it will be caught and the property of the will contain the exception information. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`PictureBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `PictureBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#516](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#516)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#516](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#516)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadProgressChanged As ProgressChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 在异步图像加载操作的进度更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the progress of an asynchronous image-loading operation has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发生仅映像异步加载时通过使用之一方法。The occurs only when the image is loaded asynchronously by using one of the methods. 图像加载的进度百分比报告与属性。The progress percentage of the image load is reported with the property of the . 处理如果你想要反映在异步图像加载操作的进度或相似的控件。Handle the if you want to reflect the progress of an asynchronous image-loading operation in a or similar control. 使用属性若要更新进度值。Use the property of the to update the progress value. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含名为`pictureBox1`、名为`startLoadButton`，和一个名为`progressBar1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1`, a named `startLoadButton`, and a named `progressBar1`. 请确保`startLoadButton_Click`方法与按钮事件和`pictureBox1_LoadProgressChanged`方法与事件`pictureBox1`。Make sure that the `startLoadButton_Click` method is associated with the event for the button and the `pictureBox1_LoadProgressChanged` method is associated with the event for `pictureBox1`. 必须将图像文件路径更改为你系统上有效的路径。You must change the image file path to a path that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnHandleCreated(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnHandleCreated (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::PictureBoxSizeMode SizeMode { System::Windows::Forms::PictureBoxSizeMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::PictureBoxSizeMode value); };

summary.span: 指示如何显示图像。

span.span: Indicates how the image is displayed.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的有效值，将从枚举。Valid values for this property are taken from the enumeration. 默认情况下，在模式下，定位在的左上角，和对来说太大的映像的任何部分剪辑。By default, in mode, the is positioned in the upper-left corner of the , and any part of the image that is too big for the is clipped. 使用值会使图像拉伸或收缩以适应。Using the value causes the image to stretch or shrink to fit the . 使用值会使图像拉伸或收缩，以适合; 但是，保留在原始纵横比。Using the value causes the image to be stretched or shrunk to fit the ; however, the aspect ratio in the original is maintained. 使用值导致控件调整到始终适合图像。Using the value causes the control to resize to always fit the image. 使用值将导致在客户端区域中居中的图像。Using the value causes the image to be centered in the client area. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializePictureBoxAndButton`从窗体的构造函数或通过加载事件处理方法的方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializePictureBoxAndButton` method from the form's constructor or Load-event handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode/VB/Form1.vb#10)]

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool WaitOnLoad { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示图像是否是同步加载的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an image is loaded synchronously.

value.span: 如果图像加载操作是同步完成的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an image-loading operation is completed synchronously; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性`true`意味着图像是否同步加载。Setting the property to `true` means the image is loaded synchronously. 这将导致用户界面可从其他输入受阻，直到加载映像。This causes the user interface to be blocked from other input until the image is loaded. 当是`false`（默认值） 和方法用于加载图像时，加载指定的映像，以及用户可以进行交互时使用界面的加载过程中显示的图像。When is `false` (the default) and the method is used to load the image, the image is displayed when the specified image is loaded, and the user can interact with the interface during the load process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含名为`pictureBox1`和名为`startLoadButton`。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1` and a named `startLoadButton`. 请确保与关联的按钮的事件`startLoadButton_Click`在此示例中的方法。Make sure that the event for the button is associated with the `startLoadButton_Click` method in this example. 必须将图像文件路径更改为一个在你的系统上有效。You must change the image file path to one that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)]
